headline.print_headline: Militants Kill 20 in Two Separate Yemen Attacks: Sources
headline.main: Militants Kill 20 in Two Separate Yemen Attacks: Sources

docs.snippet: A suicide bomber linked to al Qaeda drove a car laden with explosives into a hospital used as a base by Yemen's Shi'ite Muslim Houthi movement on Sunday, killing at least 15 people,  and five more died in an ambush in the south of the country....
docs.lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber linked to al Qaeda drove a car laden with explosives into a hospital used as a base by Yemen's Shi'ite Muslim Houthi movement on Sunday, killing at least 15 people,  and five more died in an ambush in the south of the country.

headline.print_headline: 'Ghost Riders' Draw Scrutiny for Transit Systems
headline.main: 'Ghost Riders' Draw Scrutiny for Transit Systems

docs.snippet: Transit agencies across Pennsylvania are being scrutinized by the state over the subsidies they claim for transporting riders 65 and older, with at least four agencies being docked millions for inflating senior ridership numbers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Transit agencies across Pennsylvania are being scrutinized by the state over the subsidies they claim for transporting riders 65 and older, with at least four agencies being docked millions for inflating senior ridership numbers.

headline.print_headline: Iran State TV: BBC Tried to Steal From 'Archives'
headline.main: Iran State TV: BBC Tried to Steal From 'Archives'

docs.snippet: Iranian state television accused the BBC on Sunday of trying to steal "artistic, historic and cultural documents" from government archives in the Islamic Republic....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iranian state television accused the BBC on Sunday of trying to steal "artistic, historic and cultural documents" from government archives in the Islamic Republic.

headline.print_headline: Boehner: US May Need Ground Troops vs. Militants
headline.main: Boehner: US May Need Ground Troops vs. Militants

docs.snippet: House Speaker John Boehner says the United States may have "no choice" but to send American troops to fight Islamic State group militants if President Barack Obama's strategy fails to destroy the extremist group....
docs.lead_paragraph: House Speaker John Boehner says the United States may have "no choice" but to send American troops to fight Islamic State group militants if President Barack Obama's strategy fails to destroy the extremist group.

headline.print_headline: Police: 15 Hurt in Miami Nightclub Shooting
headline.main: Police: 15 Hurt in Miami Nightclub Shooting

docs.snippet: A shooting sent terrified patrons scrambling from a Miami nightclub early Sunday and left 15 people wounded, including an 11-year-old child, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A shooting sent terrified patrons scrambling from a Miami nightclub early Sunday and left 15 people wounded, including an 11-year-old child, authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Estonia, Sweden Honor 1994 Ferry Disaster Victims
headline.main: Estonia, Sweden Honor 1994 Ferry Disaster Victims

docs.snippet: Hundreds of people gathered Sunday in Estonia and Sweden to commemorate 852 people killed in one of Europe's worst peacetime disasters 20 years ago when the Estonia ferry sank en route from Tallinn to Stockholm....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of people gathered Sunday in Estonia and Sweden to commemorate 852 people killed in one of Europe's worst peacetime disasters 20 years ago when the Estonia ferry sank en route from Tallinn to Stockholm.

headline.print_headline: Derek Jeter Has RBI Single in Last At-Bat
headline.main: Derek Jeter Has RBI Single in Last At-Bat

docs.snippet: On the last day of his remarkable career, Derek Jeter performed one final amazing feat....
docs.lead_paragraph: On the last day of his remarkable career, Derek Jeter performed one final amazing feat.

headline.print_headline: German Police Investigate Alleged Refugee Abuse
headline.main: German Police Investigate Alleged Refugee Abuse

docs.snippet: Police are investigating accusations that security guards at an asylum center in western Germany repeatedly abused refugees physically and mentally....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police are investigating accusations that security guards at an asylum center in western Germany repeatedly abused refugees physically and mentally.

headline.print_headline: Owner's Comments Heap Pressure on Newcastle Boss Pardew
headline.main: Owner's Comments Heap Pressure on Newcastle Boss Pardew

docs.snippet: Whether a throwaway joke or an ominous warning, Newcastle United owner Mike Ashley's suggestions that Alan Pardew will be sacked should they lose their Premier League match at Stoke City on Monday has heaped more unwelcome pressure on the manager....
docs.lead_paragraph: Whether a throwaway joke or an ominous warning, Newcastle United owner Mike Ashley's suggestions that Alan Pardew will be sacked should they lose their Premier League match at Stoke City on Monday has heaped more unwelcome pressure on the manager.

headline.sub: Newly-weds Clooney and Alamuddin in Venice
headline.main: Newlyweds Clooney and Alamuddin in Venice

docs.snippet: Newlyweds George Clooney and Amal Alamuddin left their hotel the day after their wedding, to join friends for an afternoon reception in Venice. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Newlyweds George Clooney and Amal Alamuddin left their hotel the day after their wedding, to join friends for an afternoon reception in Venice. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
